text: Located in Amtech building 07-01 (top floor), carrying a complete array of M10 tools from Taiwan/China, although being a whole seller they are kind enough to entertain small personal purchases. Thanks to Mdm Christine Ya for hospitality!

Wing Poh distributes Hozelock products in Singapore. I love their pressure sprayer, and have used them for last 20 years. I brought my 8-year old pressure sprayer as the spray was weak despite having pumped it. They serviced it free of charge, and told me it needed some cleaning to clear build-up over the years. The pressure sprayer now works as good as new. Great product, even better service!
They are doing wholesale. Small tools even single pc they will also entertain. Only CASH payment. Great service, quality tools...
Great service. Would shop again for some other japan tools. Thanks for the hex key üëç
Customer service is close to zero, just go online with them, don't bother to go their physical store
